search.name: The Disastrous Life of Saiki K (ONA)
search.overview: Anime (flash) adaptation of the Saiki Kusuo no Ψ-nan manga by Asou Shuichi, telling the story about a male high school student named Kusuo Saiki. He possesses supernatural powers that cause unfortunate events in his everyday life.

search.name: KY系JC小空气
search.overview: 本片为一个脑洞略大的不会看气氛的初中女生的日常生活故事泡面番

title: 宇宙戦艦ヤマト2199 第七章「そして艦は行く」

search.original_title: 宇宙戦艦ヤマト2199 第七章「そして艦は行く」
search.overview: Theatrical release of episodes 23-26 of Space Battleship Yamato 2199.
search.title: Space Battleship Yamato 2199: And Now the Warship Comes

title: ポンコツクエスト-魔王と派遣の魔物たち-

search.name: PONKOTSUKUESUTO ~魔王和派遣的魔物们~
search.original_name: ポンコツクエスト～魔王と派遣の魔物たち～
search.overview: 为魔王服务的魔物“角”和“井村”，被魔王派遣到各种地方，每次都会互相吵架抱怨... 这部喜剧动画描绘了在RPG一般的幻想世界中如现代人一样插科打诨的日常生活。

title: にじいろ☆プリズムガール

search.name: 虹色女孩☆钻石星路
search.original_name: にじいろ☆プリズムガール
search.overview: 小日向虹架（こひなた にじか）是艺能事务所社长的独生女。虽说如此她却过着跟演艺圈全然无关的生活。直到有一天，机缘巧合为一名临演代班时对演戏产生了兴趣。于是关于虹架踏入演艺圈故事由此展开。

title: 劇場版 薄桜鬼 第一章 京都乱舞

search.original_title: 劇場版 薄桜鬼 第一章 京都乱舞
search.overview: There's a war going on in ancient Kyoto. A war fought in shadows, between the forces of the Shogunate's armed enforcers, the Shinsengumi, and the vampire-like Ronin warriors known as the Rasetsu or Furies. And trapped in the middle is a young woman disguised as a man.  Seeking her missing father, Chizuru Yukimura comes to Kyoto only to find her fate forever intertwined with the destinies of Shinsengumi Vice commander Toshizo Hijikata and his elite force of swordsmen. Because Chizuru's father has created a secret elixir that enhances the user's strength, speed and healing, and the furies will do anything and kill anyone in order to control that power!
search.title: 剧场版 薄樱鬼 第1章 京都乱舞
